name: Tales From Mini-Mart
description:
Mini-Mart is a chain of supermarkets that were on the rise in the early 2000s. However, due to the unfathomable longevity of their products, they were convinced to close their doors by a group of businessmen.

Today, the Mini-Marts remain untouched, with hundreds of fresh products that are yet to expire, waiting to be grabbed by the next scavenger.

These stores truly are a wonder of our generation... Or are they?

Tales From Mini-Mart is a shopping simulator where you have to run around an abondoned store rummaging through items, trying to find the ones on your shopping list. You may or may not have to run away from something...

Game Ideas: R3tronaut and tEEvy

Programming and art: tEEvy

Sound effects: R3tronaut
